Description.Chinese: Get Rewards for destroying the harbor/comeback fleet of the pirates. You will also get/loose reputation from AI, if they hate/like the pirates (below 26 and over 69). I recommend my Stronger Pirates mods, so you really deserve these rewards ;)
Description.English: Get Rewards for destroying the harbor/comeback fleet of the pirates. You will also get/loose reputation from AI, if they hate/like the pirates (below 26 and over 69). I recommend my Stronger Pirates mods, so you really deserve these rewards ;)
Description.French: Get Rewards for destroying the harbor/comeback fleet of the pirates. You will also get/loose reputation from AI, if they hate/like the pirates (below 26 and over 69). I recommend my Stronger Pirates mods, so you really deserve these rewards ;)
Description.German: Bekomme Belohnungen fürs Zerstören des Kontors/der Comeback Flotte der Piraten. Steigert/mindert deinen Ruf bei der KI, abhängig davon ob sie die Piraten mochten oder nicht (unter 26 und über 69). Ich empfehle dazu meine Stronger Pirates Mods, damit die Belohnung auch verdient ist ;)
